title: Fresh peach trifle
ingredients: ['1 (175g) packet trifle sponge or sliced Madeira cake', '85g amaretti biscuits', '150ml Marsala wine', '5 ripe peaches - stones removed, peeled and sliced', '300ml milk', '3 tablespoons caster sugar', '2 tablespoons cornflour', '3 eggs', '2 teaspoons almond extract', '200ml double cream, whipped', 'toasted almond flakes, to taste']
